sentences.en: A Dutch newspaper photographed the president waiting forlornly in the rain.
sentences.cn: 一份荷兰报纸拍到了总统形单影只地在雨中等待的照片。

sentences.en: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.cn: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

sentences.en: Alexander Lazarus is a food critic for the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大·拉扎勒斯是为该报撰稿的饮食评论家。

sentences.en: Allan gave an interview to the Chicago Tribune newspaper last month.
sentences.cn: 艾伦上个月接受了《芝加哥论坛报》的采访。

sentences.en: Daniel finished the article and laid the newspaper down on his desk.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔看完文章后把报纸放在他的书桌上。

sentences.en: I came down this morning to get the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我今天上午过来取报纸。

sentences.en: I think he was born to be editor of a tabloid newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他天生就是当小报编辑的料。

sentences.en: Prospective buyers should study the small ads in the daily newspaper.
sentences.cn: 打算购物的人应该研究研究日报上的小广告。

sentences.en: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.en: The local newspaper misreported the story by claiming the premises were rented.
sentences.cn: 当地报纸报道有误，称这些房屋已经出租了。

sentences.en: The newspaper breached the code of conduct on privacy.
sentences.cn: 该报违反了保护隐私的行为准则。

sentences.en: The newspaper came out weekly. It satirized political leaders.
sentences.cn: 该报纸每周一期，讽刺各位政治领导人。

sentences.en: The newspaper is fighting a damages action brought by the actress.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸正和提起损害赔偿诉讼的女演员对簿公堂。

sentences.en: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报社的工作让我日复一日地做着同样的事。

sentences.en: The newspaper used the neologism "dinks", Double Income No Kids.
sentences.cn: 报纸使用了新词“丁克族”，即“双收入无子女”。

sentences.en: The Tundra Times, a weekly newspaper in Alaska, ceased publication this week.
sentences.cn: 阿拉斯加的周报《苔原时报》本周停刊了。

sentences.en: There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

trans.tran_en: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly
